title: Ultra-Modern 2-Level 2-Bedroom Luxury Loft ***5 MINS FROM STRIP
map_address: Las Vegas Blvd near South Strip
posting_body: ['***AVAILABLE 8.15.2022', 'Fabulous 1,600+ sqft Loft-style condo for rent in popular guard-gated community on the south end of Las Vegas Blvd.', '2 bedrooms, 2.5 bathrooms and underground parking.', '2-level unit with living area and master suite upstairs and bonus den/home office/2nd bedroom downstairs.', '2 balconies: one off of master suite and one off of living room.', 'Open floor plan with high ceilings, beautiful bamboo-wood floors and neutral colors.', "Ultra-modern gourmet kitchen with custom Pogen-Pohl cabinets, Kohl's faucets and vanities, breakfast bar, nook and high-end appliances.", 'Luxurious master suite with dual vanities in master bathroom.', 'Full bathroom for guests.', 'Laundry room in unit with washer/dryer.', 'Underground parking with assigned parking space included.', 'Amenities galore: 24-hr security with guard-gates, assigned underground parking, clubhouse with exercise room (gym and weight room), lounge, swimming pool and spa', 'Rent: $2,500/month', 'Security deposit: $2,500', 'Pet deposit: $500+$50/mo.', 'pet rent', 'App.fee: $100/applicant  + $200 admin fee', '***Easy application process, ALL CREDITS APPROVED!', 'Just need proof of income for 3x rent and clean rental history.', 'Bad credit may result in a higher deposit - call with any questions.', 'For more information or to schedule a showing please call', 'show contact info', '(Please leave a detailed message)', 'Office hours are Mo-Fri 9-5, Sat 9-4', 'Green Valley - Southern Highlands - Silverado Ranch area leasing specialist', 'American Realty Properties', 'Lic:170610', 'Keyword: Pittsburgh loft']
